short_summary: DEVELOP A CANADIAN VEHICLE CYBER SECURITY FRAMEWORK
description: Transport Canada is seeking the services of a specialized contractor to develop a framework for managing vehicle cyber security policy and policy-related instruments, including a Canadian Vehicle Cyber Security Primer and an Analysis and Recommendations for Managing Vehicle Cyber Security Moving Forward.
full_summary:
Transport Canada is seeking proposals from specialized contractors to develop a Canadian Vehicle Cyber Security Framework. This comprehensive framework will provide information and direction for the management of vehicle cyber security policy and related instruments.

To develop the framework, the contractor will need to bring technical and policy expertise to the table. The framework will comprise of a Canadian Vehicle Cyber Security Primer, Recommendations for a Canadian Vehicle Cyber Security Program, and an Analysis and Recommendations for Managing Vehicle Cyber Security Going Forward. 

Transport Canada requires a deep domain-specific knowledge of Canada’s legislative framework, technical standards and regulations, cyber security and software management systems, cyber security reporting and monitoring processes.
